quote: Wisdom is like fire. People take it from others.

recipe.name: Jollof Rice
steps: Sauté onions and peppers in oil.
Add tomato paste and blended tomatoes, cook until thick.
Stir in rice and chicken stock.
Cover and cook until rice is done.
Serve hot with fried plantains or chicken.

recipe.name: Egusi Soup
steps: Cook meat until tender.
Heat palm oil and sauté onions.
Add ground egusi and stir for 5 minutes.
Add meat, water, and leafy greens.
Simmer until soup thickens and serve with pounded yam or fufu.

quote: Rain does not fall on one roof alone.

recipe.name: Ugali with Sukuma Wiki
steps: Boil water and gradually add maize flour, stirring continuously until thick.
Sauté onions and tomatoes in oil, add kale and cook until tender.
Serve ugali on a plate with sukuma wiki on the side.

quote: Even the best cooking pot will not produce food.

recipe.name: Bobotie
steps: Soak bread in milk.
Sauté onions, then add meat and curry powder.
Mix in soaked bread, raisins, and seasoning.
Place in oven dish and pour beaten eggs over meat.
Bake at 180°C for 30–40 minutes and serve with yellow rice.

quote: A child who is not embraced by the village will burn it down to feel its warmth.

recipe.name: Matoke
steps: Peel and boil plantains until soft.
Sauté onions and tomatoes in oil.
Add boiled plantains and mash gently.
Simmer together for 5–10 minutes and serve hot.

recipe.name: Doro Wat
steps: Sauté onions in butter until soft.
Add garlic and berbere, cook for 2 minutes.
Add chicken and enough water to cover.
Simmer for 45 minutes until chicken is cooked and sauce thickens.
Serve with injera.

quote: A man who uses force is afraid of reasoning.

recipe.name: Thieboudienne
steps: Fry fish until golden and set aside.
Sauté onion and tomatoes, add vegetables and cook 5–10 minutes.
Add rice and water, cover and cook until rice is done.
Serve rice with fish and vegetables on top.

quote: A man who sees a hen lay an egg does not boast.

recipe.name: Tagine with Chicken and Preserved Lemons
steps: Sauté onions in olive oil.
Add chicken and spices, brown on all sides.
Add preserved lemons and water, cover and simmer 45 minutes.
Serve hot with bread or couscous.
